markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Yarrow-Root Bandage](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1663)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Travel Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=141) pg. 101</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><row>[Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This root is often infused into bandages for life-threatening bleeding. Activating the item is part of the same activity you use to Administer First Aid to stop [bleeding](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on a creature who's also [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11). When you do, you can Administer First Aid to stop bleeding and dying as part of the same activity with only one [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check. However, the DC for the Medicine check is equal to the 5 + the higher of the two DCs to Administer First Aid.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Yarrow-Root Bandage
